ygData.subject: Re: [spoiler] Shimmering Orb
ygData.msgSnippet: this is in Upper Guk, in Innothule Swamp. Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
ygData.messageBody:
this is in Upper Guk, in Innothule Swamp.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Douglass Family [mailto:frd@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 9:02 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] [spoiler] Shimmering Orb
>
>
> From: "Douglass Family" <frd@...>
>
> Im sorry but where is this ?, I mean what dungeon?
>
> Sounds cool
> Jaezebel Moonsong
> Gypsy Bard of the 20th Stanza
> Innoruuk
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Brendan <brendan@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 10:13 PM
> Subject: [eqbards] [spoiler] Shimmering Orb
>
>
> >From: Brendan <brendan@...>
> >
> >from the entrance, just take the first right, swim through
> the water, past
> >the spiders, and down the stairs. you will end up in the
> scryer room. the
> >shimmering orb is a great shield for bards, i borrow one
> from my enchanter
> >friend when i'm in a party with several tanks since i know
> i'll be taking
> >a large percentage of the hits because of bard hate.
> >
> >on fennin ro, they can sell for outrageous amounts of money.
> some people
> >only seem willing to buy them for 250pp, but i sold one last week for
> >600pp.. and i've heard they used to go for 800 or 1000. yowza.
> >
> >
> ><*baal*> it's not my fault
> ><*baal*> i'm just made cute!
> >
> >
